page.title: 12Sellindge School,1985.
page.content: Sellindge Primary has 3 classes three teachers and a headmaster.There are 3 Houses Whitehall red,Moorstock yellow and Hoddiford blue.There are an infant class a Junior class and a 4th year class which has 2nd and 3rd year children in it as well.The class teachers are Mrs Ironside, Mrs Rand and Mr Sonnen respectively.The name of the headmaster is Mr Wilson.Class I has 22 children class R 24 and class S has 23.The School has 4 class rooms 2, in the main building,2 mobiles,hall,an office,girls and boys toilets and a library.The School has a field and a playground and also a canteen where we eat.There are 3 cooks and two ladies who clear the plates.The school secretary is Mrs.Heard,who works all day on Monday and Friday but only mornings on Tuesday,Wednesday and Thursday.
